tweet.text: On Dec.4, 1987, Soviet Amb. Dubinin invited Powell to dinner with KGB head Kryuchkov to work on the Washington Summit. Powell brought Deputy CIA Director Gates, “an occasion of historic importance” between senior members of the intelligence services. https://t.co/etq65RU76r (3/4) https://t.co/TR44SNjwFA
